name: Spooky Driver ★★★ - FREE
summary:
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PancakeStudios.SpookyDriver 
 
DRIVE as fast as you can! 
PASS the driving cars! 
 
Spooky Driver drives you crazy! 
 
Pass as many cars as you can and get your own place in the top 10 highscores. 
 
★ AdFree - NO annoying banners! 
★ 100+ cool cars to choose from! 
★ Play to gain new awesome cars and medals! 
★ Three well-designed themes (forest, street and sea) to pass. 
★ Top ten ONLINE highscores! 
★ Challenge your friends! 
 
Start your spooky driving adventure now! 
 
Made by Pancake Studios...
